experience: You and Richard both know David Norris, Michael Jones, and 5 others

Providing virtual CTO and tech guidance to the awesome startup entrepreneurs at Expert Dojo.  Creating Certified Developers program.  Changing the way Startups get created so that more great ideas can get their start!
CTO / Architect / Senior Engineer, Ruby on Rails

Various projects: Freelance rails developer, contract but open to W2 or 1099, long or short term requirements.  Typically surrounded with junior developers to maximize value, leveraging experience as an instructor for the 3-month Web Development Intensive at General Assembly.  Applications architecture consultant to startups and new projects.  Software consultant to new businesses.

Gipper is a mobile video app startup that is currently in stealth mode. Tech advances were required to produce version 1.0.  Ant King and More Voltage developers did the coding in Objective C and Swift.  Tools included xCode, AWS, Parse.com, Crashlytics, and Github. I provided tech and product guidance - and a bit of code here and there.

The founder, myself, and a top programmer from the class I taught at General Assembly built a B2B app with 60+ tables, 80+ views, and 50+ controllers, and developed a solid, logical, good-looking, super user-friendly databased app. This is one of the best Rails projects I've ever seen and I'm very proud of it and the work that was done, as well as the tight teamwork.
Rails Instructor / WDI Web Development Immersive

"WDI, the Web Development Immersive: Twelve weeks. All day. Every day."​  General Assembly totally rocks and so do the students.  We pushed them really hard - classes end at 5:30 but we didn't close until 10:30pm and students frequently stay late to work on their projects.  I was on the incredible instructor team - teaching Rails, SQL, Postgres, Mongo, Angular, and some other technologies too.  This is like 3 semester-long courses stripped down to the coding, labs, projects, and mentoring.  This is the rocket-to-mars version of learning to code.  I was very privileged to be on the Santa Monica team, the leading edge of the leading edge of full-stack dev training.
That guy that lived in and helped you in the computer center.

Michel Bayan
CEO & Co-Founder at DirecTech Labs
February 19, 2015, Richard reported directly to Michel

Working with Michel was an awesome experience and a great time in my life.  After a few months, I felt like we were brothers - he was always supportive in getting us through difficult challenges, and is one of the few people I know who can match me in ability to stick with a requirements and design session for however long it takes to get it finalized!  He combines being a people person and a technical person, came through under pressure, and always me feel like he cared for me as person even though I worked for him.  He can elicit opinions from the staff, and get them to define the pro's and con's of what they each were recommending, get people aligned to one solution, and have everyone leave the meeting feeling good.

summary: CTO Software Development Manager & Rails ProgrammerI supercharge software development and produce breakthrough results. I build tech teams with a sense of belonging who communicate, work together, invent, have fun, and can't wait to come in to work each day and be brilliant!Connect with me at: richard.grossman@systemsengine.com.****************CTO Ruby on Rails & Mobile Application Development at Systems Engine. Provide consulting services to startups on software development, startup operations, UI & UX, team building, hiring, budgeting, & planning.  Manage programmers, architect stacks, and hands-on code as well.Previously founding CTO at mobile application startup Klutch, an awesome mobile app startup, a Launchpad LA company and then a Cross Campus (crosscamp.us) founders room company.I was our first iPhone coder, Objective-C & XCode, outsourced, then built onsite team. Did some coding in RubyOnRails, Android Java, Javascript, PHP, & moved backend to AWS. Prior: CTO Software Development Startup. Systems Engine helps companies get tech staffing right & make architecture decisions.Prior: Five years at a very competitive hedge fund building and leading IT, applications, and software development, big data analysis, metrics, analytics, statistical analysis, financial trading, portfolio management, quantitative analytics, partnership accounting, and regulatory compliance.If you are hiring a CTO or a Software Development Manager, call me at 424-229-2829.
